title: Adaptive Malware Detection using Sequential Feature Selection: A Dueling Double Deep Q-Network (D3QN) Framework for Intelligent Classification
evasion_focus: Reinforcement learning-based adaptive feature selection for malware evasion and detection
summary: Proposes D3QN framework for adaptive sequential feature selection. Agent learns to dynamically select informative features per sample, optimizing both accuracy and computational efficiency through learned policies.

title: DeepTrust: Multi-Step Classification through Dissimilar Adversarial Representations for Robust Android Malware Detection
evasion_focus: Adversarial robustness against feature-space evasion attacks
summary: Novel metaheuristic with classifiers arranged in ordered sequence. Maximizes divergence of learned representations, making decision space unpredictable for attackers.

title: Effectiveness of Adversarial Benign and Malware Examples in Evasion and Poisoning Attacks
evasion_focus: Benign adversarial examples for evasion and poisoning attacks
summary: Investigates effectiveness of benign and malicious adversarial examples in PE file domain. Shows benign AEs can increase false positives in antivirus systems.

title: StealthCup: Realistic, Multi-Stage, Evasion-Focused CTF for Benchmarking IDS
evasion_focus: Real-world IDS evasion through multi-stage attacks
summary: Novel IDS evaluation methodology using CTF competition with professional penetration testers. Demonstrates blind spots in both open-source and commercial IDS systems.

title: Evasive Ransomware Attacks Using Low-level Behavioral Adversarial Examples
evasion_focus: Low-level behavioral modification for ransomware evasion
summary: Introduces low-level behavioral adversarial examples for ransomware. Demonstrates optimal malware generation through micro-behavior control functions.

title: Evaluating the robustness of adversarial defenses in malware detection systems
summary: Proposes Prioritized Binary Rounding and sigma-binary attack. Exposes vulnerabilities in state-of-the-art malware defenses in binary-constrained domains.

title: Zero Day Malware Detection with Alpha: Fast DBI with Transformer Models for Real World Application
evasion_focus: Detection of adaptive malware through behavioral patterns
summary: Framework for zero-day detection using Transformer models and Assembly patterns. Uses DBI to capture authentic behavior while defeating evasion techniques.

title: Adversarially Robust and Interpretable Magecart Malware Detection
evasion_focus: Web-based malware evasion through script obfuscation
summary: ML models (tree-based, linear, kernel-based) for Magecart detection with adversarial training. Behavior DFA for analyzing script execution patterns.

title: CryptoGuard: Lightweight Hybrid Detection and Response to Host-based Cryptojackers in Linux Cloud Environments
summary: Lightweight hybrid solution with sketch and sliding window-based syscall monitoring. Two-phase classification with eBPF-based remediation.

title: LibIHT: A Hardware-Based Approach to Efficient and Evasion-Resistant Dynamic Binary Analysis
summary: Hardware-assisted tracing framework using Intel branch tracing. Preserves program behavior against anti-analysis evasion techniques.
